channel.title: CVE Feed for Softnext -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Softnext -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-48378|2024-10-08T14:16:25.159Z -- softnext -- mail%20sqr%20expert
item.description: Softnext Mail SQR Expert has a path traversal vulnerability within its parameter in a specific URL. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication and download arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2024-5670|2024-07-31T18:12:20.483Z -- softnext -- sn%20os%2012.1
item.description: The web services of Softnext's products, Mail SQR Expert and Mail Archiving Expert do not properly validate user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject arbitrary OS commands and execute them on the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-5670|2024-07-29T02:23:20.658Z -- softnext -- sn%20os%2012.1
item.description: The web services of Softnext's products, Mail SQR Expert and Mail Archiving Expert do not properly validate user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject arbitrary OS commands and execute them on the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-5670|2024-08-01T21:18:06.849Z -- softnext -- sn%20os%2012.1
item.description: The web services of Softnext's products, Mail SQR Expert and Mail Archiving Expert do not properly validate user input, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject arbitrary OS commands and execute them on the remote server.
